body:
Sorry, when I put ... I meant ```/path_to_nccl/build/```.
```CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH``` needs to point to a directory where there is an ```include``` dir with nccl.h and a ```lib``` with  the .so files.
If you compiled nccl from source there may be ```build``` dir where you installed the code from. If so that's the dir ```CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH``` should be pointed to.
